books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: In this psychological thriller by the author of “The Girl on the Train,” women are found drowned in a river in an English town.
books.name: INTO THE WATER

books.author: by Helen Hardt
books.description: More Steel family secrets are revealed as Melanie gains confidence in her love for guilt-plagued Jonah.
books.name: SURRENDER

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: A complete collection of Jack Reacher stories.
books.name: NO MIDDLE NAME

books.author: by Stephen King and Richard Chizmar
books.description: King returns to Castle Rock, Me., in this novella set in 1974.
books.name: GWENDY'S BUTTON BOX

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: In San Francisco, Detective Lindsay Boxer and the Women’s Murder Club face their toughest case yet.
books.name: 16TH SEDUCTION

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: In a dystopian future, men and women perform the services assigned to them. Originally published in 1986.
books.name: THE HANDMAID'S TALE

books.author: by Dorothea Benton Frank
books.description: Two couples form a lifelong friendship during their annual reunions on one of South Carolina’s barrier islands.
books.name: SAME BEACH, NEXT YEAR

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The detective Amos Decker (“Memory Man”) witnesses a murder-suicide that turns out to be a matter of national security.
books.name: THE FIX

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher, still in the Army, becomes involved in an investigation with elite agents from the F.B.I. and C.I.A.
books.name: NIGHT SCHOOL

books.author: by Scott Turow
books.description: A former Illinois prosecutor joins the International Criminal Court to investigate a massacre in Bosnia.
books.name: TESTIMONY

books.author: by Lincoln Child
books.description: Could hikers in the Adirondacks have been killed by werewolves?
books.name: FULL WOLF MOON

books.author: by Penelope Sky
books.description: After Pearl's retreat to New York City, the conflicted Crow follows.
books.name: BUTTONS AND PAIN

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Lucas Davenport, now a U.S. Marshal, pursues a thief who robbed a drug cartel and killed a child in Biloxi, Miss.
books.name: GOLDEN PREY

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Martha Hall Kelly
books.description: A story of three women’s lives during and after World War II.
books.name: LILAC GIRLS
